data.eml:eml: Etheostoma erythrozonum, a new species of darter (Teleostei: Percidae) from the Meramec River drainage, Missouri

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Switzer, John F., Wood, Robert M. (2009): Etheostoma erythrozonum, a new species of darter (Teleostei: Percidae) from the Meramec River drainage, Missouri. Zootaxa 2095: 1-7, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274836
